reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater fits true to size and appreciate its quality, describing it as wonderfully soft and not itchy at all. They like its appearance, with one customer noting it gets lots of compliments, and its color, particularly the pretty pink shade. The sweater is warm for winter days, has the right weight for cooler weather, and one customer mentions it works well as a layering piece.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and super soft
items.body: The material is super soft and not itchy at all. I have this color and also an orange red color and they are amazing! The sizing is accurate. There is no shrinkage as I was it in gentle cycle and air dry. The overall style is beautiful. I need all the colors Read more
items.author: kobrien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater.
items.body: I love everything about this sweater: the material, the fit, the color and NO ACRYLIC. It is on the lighter side, so it's perfect for fall & spring. Great layering piece for the winter as well. I am 5'7" / 160 lbs / 36D and ordered an XL because I wanted an oversized fit for leggings. I went ahead and ordered the mocha color as well after receiving this beautiful burgundy. Read more
items.author: Sandra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Fall Days
items.body: Great sweater! Nice and long, cozy but not too thick. Comfortable material. Read more
items.author: Becca

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pick!
items.body: I’ve never purchased blouses or women's tops online before so was a little concerned if I’d be happy with them or how’s they would fit. This sweater is absolutely beautiful, soft and inviting to wear! I have zero regrets! Read more
items.author: Laurel Calene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy
items.body: Super soft and cozy! Very comfortable and fits well. I wanted a slightly baggy sweater, and this fits the bill. The color is gorgeous (ordered in green). Looks like it does online. True to size. Would recommend and will likely buy in more colors. Read more
items.author: gkmorris17

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: very comfortable and great fit. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Returned. Too large
items.body: I was surprised how thick and soft this sweater was. I had hoped it would fit but it was extremely too large for me. It was very wide and made me look odd. I know it says oversized in the description but this just looked ridiculous on me. I also didn’t really love the sleeves; either how they are tapered at the wrists or how they kind of fell short. All in all it was a bad fit for me. Sadly almost no one sells size xs anymore because everyone is so big so it is getting harder and harder for me to find clothes that actually fit me Read more
items.author: Nicholas C Black

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort first
items.body: Very comfortable sweater. Soft. No scratching. Fits just right. Loose but not too loose. Read more
items.author: PGW

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Apricot, Dusty Pink, Rose, Army Green, Black, Mocha, Coffee, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Orangered, Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
